::Firearm::

Firearm slides the machine away, looking at Spears' spark inside it. 
At least if she self destructed now, her spark would be allright. He 
watches the machine as it lightly bumps against the other side of the 
room, the Maximal turning back to Spears.

"Allright, now let's see what we can do about that chip," he says to 
himself, taking a small device from the table. It was tiny in his 
large fingers, but he managed to aim it at the trainer chip, a small 
beam emerging out of it. It was a mini EMP generator, designed to 
disable tiny electric devices.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Yanshosh: Yes, so far, the operation is successful.
